title: Evernote TYpeface
content:
What is the evernote typeface? Its a slab serif. It reminds me of URW Egyptienne

what the font is telling me it’s Caecilia but I dont think it is

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pmn-caecilia/55-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090810201830/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pmn-caecilia/55-roman/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pmn-caecilia/55-roman/")
author: andrewps

comments.content: It’s actually Caecilia bold, in all small caps
